channel.description:
Just thought I would post this thread for the remembrance of all those innocent life's lost. For those of you who don't know about 9/11
9/11: the day in 2001 when Arab suicide bombers hijacked United States airliners and used them as bombs and crashed into the WTC Towers.
This is the 11th anniversary of 9/11

item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

This is ridiculous. You guys have no sense, at all.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Omer, post:10, topic:459521”][quote author=Fails link=topic=562373.msg4101060#msg4101060 date=1347484310]
I’m not racist, nor’ will I judge you because of your ethnic/religious background. I didn’t know this thread would get so… heated.
[/quote]

I’m sorry, I’m just kind of infuriated because we only pay attention to this certain event in history when thousands of people die every day.[/quote]
It was a reality check for many, there are thousands of deaths everyday, but planes don’t get flown into towers in Manhattan everyday.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Yes, that is true… but as I said previously, most of them aren’t from terrorist attacks. This event filled Americans with fear, we constantly had to watch our back.

I just wanted us to remember 9/11, it was all good intentions.

Read full topic

I respect your point, but Afghans aren’t Arab[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Omer, post:1, topic:459521”]Let the fuck go of it.
What about the casualties of the Iraqi war?
What about the casualties of the Afghani war?

Again, let the fuck go of it. It happened, cool. Stop moaning about 9/11, it’s over.

What’s the difference between a cow and 9/11?
You can’t milk a cow for 11 years.

Only 3,000 people died. Shit happens all the time, stop holding on to this. People die every day, pussies. Why not make a thread about each? Why don’t we mourn over them every anniversary of their death?
Shit like this makes me sad to be American[/quote]
Thank you for a summary of this thread.

Fails: Again, why attack Afghanistan and not Saudi Arabia?
